isText.title: Is Text Content
isText.description: Is the file content in text format or not?

responseContentType.title: Type of File Content
responseContentType.description: Property to identify the MIME type and/or encoding of the file in response. This property is applicable only for GET/DOWNLOAD actions on file. Generally, the response from the standard MIME Content-Type header unless there is a custom way the endpoint sends this information.
